testcase.name: Add and delete a new asset to the application
testcase.system-out: Given the url "https://test-monitor-qa.pexapark.com"........................passed Then Login to the application with user name "test-user-1" and password "ae8743rzq36cq2x".passed Given Validate you are on Add Asset page....................................passed When Enter the name as "Test123" and capacity factor as "1212"..............passed Then Click on Submit........................................................passed And Validate the asset is added in the table for "Success" and asset name "Test123".passed And If "Success" is success then delete the asset with name as "Test123"....passed

testcase.name: Add, edit and delete a new asset to the application
testcase.system-out: Given the url "https://test-monitor-qa.pexapark.com"........................passed Then Login to the application with user name "test-user-1" and password "ae8743rzq36cq2x".passed Given Validate you are on Add Asset page....................................passed When Enter the name as "Test123" and capacity factor as "1212"..............passed Then Click on Submit........................................................passed And Validate the asset is added in the table for "Success" and asset name "Test123".passed And If "Success" is success with asset name as "Test123" then edit the the asset with name as "Test1234" and capacity factor as "787898".passed And If "Success" is success then delete the asset with name as "Test1234"...passed
